tags: my theories are super bad i know
I wish it was just unicorns and rainbows for the rest of the season
but we've got a big storm coming
summary: I have a feeling that instead of Lucas believing that Eliott’s affection for him was an effect of his MI, I think Eliott will...
body:
I have a feeling that instead of Lucas believing that Eliott’s affection for him was an effect of his MI, I think Eliott will close himself off after what happens Friday. With all these drawings, pictures and the number of times Lucas has made references to seeing Eliott with Lucille (with Eliott reassuring that is over) I can’t see Lucas believing it was all true. Plus you can see how Lucas is the protective one in the relationship so my prediction is that Lucas will try to reach out to Eliott after Friday and either Eliott or Lucille will shut him out. This would give a whole new dimension to the story and change a lot of the events of the following episodes. 

I might be completely wrong but I want them to at least change the way Lucas reacts because as someone with an MI seeing a character react that way is really hurtful. I don’t want to believe that someone would “reject” me after reading something scary on Wikipedia without trying to listen to me first (i know the storyline is much complex than this and it’s all a part of the isak character development).

Whatever ends up happening, all I know is that it’s going to hurt really bad!

blog.description:
a movie enthusiast who is currently watching (and loving) skam france.

follow me if you want to see posts about movies and/or series that could possibly be your favs :))

tags: ugh I love them so much
summary:
Vendredi 18h35 - 'Ever since I met you, you are the only one that matters'
The French reunion scene is incredibly sensual and...
body:
Vendredi 18h35 - ‘Ever since I met you, you are the only one that matters’

The French reunion scene is incredibly sensual and exquisite because of how brilliant its cinematography is.





The colours on Lucas’s hands were of both warm (orange) and cold (blue) tones. Orange was on his left hand side, telling how his heart was engulfed in the warmth he always felt when Eliott was with him. The other warm and cold colours then clashed as they had that little paint fight, implying how two souls - one dwelled in cold darkness and the chaos of his mind; one struggled with the fire of truth sitting in his heart that always commanded him to spit it out - had finally become one at that particular moment. The sunlight that filled the room could be seen as either a symbol for how the chapter that they have always wanted to be able to unravel together, was opening wide to welcome them; or how the storms have passed for now.



The camera shifts constantly between the two characters’ faces, focusing on their eyes and the gestures of their hands rather usually, which is very important as Axel and Maxence with their exceptional body language and eye-acting were delivering such passion and sensuality. Skin is one of Elu’s means of communication. The way their fingers traced the other’s body; the way they embraced; the way they kissed hungrily as if young love must be that intense, just simply express how much they needed each other. 



Music is how Lucas expressed his feelings for Eliott. Eliott, on the other hand, used art to confess his emotions for Lucas. The scene focuses not on their intimacy but also on the colours with a soft piano track overlaying the whole. When these two elements come together, this becomes a representation of them coming together in every way possible. 



And I will never say this enough, but this reunion is art at its finest.

blog.name: gayshrug
blog.title: OH BOY!
blog.description: aaron | 23 | he/ him; gayness and spook @gayshrug on twitter | 28/09/17

tags: this really made me so happy thank you for being so supportive
summary: Even though I cannot relate to your love of Skam France, I will say that I am happy you are enjoying it as much as you are. I...
question: Even though I cannot relate to your love of Skam France, I will say that I am happy you are enjoying it as much as you are. I love when people love things. I’m happy you are finding something you need within the show.
answer:
thank you so much for this sweet message! i’m really happy about it, too. my emotional range in daily life has been at a very low point for the past few months so this show gripping me as much as it does is very fortunate.

also, the way you seem to look at people discovering things you personally can’t connect with is…… so refreshing and lovely? thank you, again. we need more joy around.

reblog.comment:

also, the way you seem to look at people discovering things you personally can’t connect with is…… so refreshing and lovely? thank you, again. we need more joy around.

also, the way you seem to look at people discovering things you personally can’t connect with is…… so refreshing and lovely? thank you, again. we need more joy around.

summary:
they really couldn't have chosen a better song than swedish garden in ça compte pas
i mean the more i think about it, the more...
body:
they really couldn’t have chosen a better song than swedish garden in ça compte pas

i mean the more i think about it, the more i’m convinced it fits perfectly, the music in itself is like a caress and just pure softness with something really melancholic behind and it suits the situation so well, i don’t know man this post is sappy but i just have a lot of feelings

Em, UK.

with others thrown in

summary: The thing I love most with season three is the use of piano music. Probably because I am a sucker for instrumental music over...
body:
The thing I love most with season three is the use of piano music. Probably because I am a sucker for instrumental music over lyrical.

But I just find there is something that is so much more simplistic but highly emotional with instrumental/piano music, and emotion just seems to be portrayed so strongly this season.
